items.question: What will I experience during this 3-night thalassotherapy stay at Dakhla Club?
items.answer:
During these 3 nights of thalassotherapy at Dakhla Club Hotel & Spa, you'll experience a holistic recovery journey designed for both body and nervous system.

This stay combines:
‚Ä¢ therapeutic marine treatments
‚Ä¢ moments of deep relaxation
‚Ä¢ a unique natural environment between ocean and desert

From the very first days, our guests feel:
‚Ä¢ deeper sleep
‚Ä¢ reduced physical tension
‚Ä¢ lower stress and mental load
‚Ä¢ a sense of disconnection and recentering

üëâ This is not just a spa ‚Äî it's a true thalasso reset experience.

items.question: What types of treatments will I receive during this thalasso stay?
items.answer:
The program includes a selection of thalassotherapy and holistic wellness treatments, adapted to your condition and needs.

Depending on your program, you may benefit from:
‚Ä¢ seawater hydromassage bath
‚Ä¢ marine algae wrap
‚Ä¢ affusion massage
‚Ä¢ muscle recovery treatments
‚Ä¢ relaxation and circulation stimulation techniques

All treatments are performed by qualified professionals in a calm and secure environment.

üéØ The goal is to revitalize the body, soothe the nervous system, and promote lasting recovery.

items.question: Is this thalasso stay suitable if I've never done a spa or wellness retreat before?
items.answer:
Yes, absolutely.

This thalasso stay is perfectly suited for those discovering thalassotherapy for the first time.

The program has been designed to be:
‚Ä¢ progressive
‚Ä¢ accessible
‚Ä¢ supervised
‚Ä¢ without excessive physical demands

Our team takes the time to guide you, explain each treatment, and respect your pace.

üëâ You don't need any prior experience to fully enjoy the stay.

items.question: Why should I book this thalasso stay quickly?
items.answer:
Thalasso stays at Dakhla Club are offered in intentionally small groups.

We welcome a limited number of guests per session to guarantee:
‚Ä¢ optimal treatment quality
‚Ä¢ a calm and soothing atmosphere
‚Ä¢ personalized attention

Spaces fill up quickly, especially during peak periods.

üëâ Booking in advance allows you to secure your spot and prepare for your stay with peace of mind.

items.question: Where will I stay during my thalasso stay in Dakhla?
items.answer:
You'll be accommodated directly at Dakhla Club Hotel & Spa, within the establishment itself.

Accommodation is an integral part of the experience:
‚Ä¢ comfortable rooms
‚Ä¢ peaceful environment
‚Ä¢ direct access to treatment areas
‚Ä¢ a setting conducive to rest and recovery

üëâ Everything is designed to extend the benefits of thalassotherapy, without unnecessary travel.

faq.content:
**Q: Can I come alone?**
A: Absolutely! 40% of our clients come alone.

**Q: Are there any contraindications?**
A: We adapt according to your health condition.

**Q: Is transportation included?**
A: Airport shuttle available (additional cost).

**Q: Can I modify my dates?**
A: Yes, subject to availability conditions.

items.question: What can I expect during these 7 nights at Dakhla Club?
items.answer: Experience a complete holistic transformation with 34 personalized thalasso treatments. Our 7-night program combines ocean-facing yoga, hydromassage baths with heated seawater, marine algae wraps, and therapeutic massages in a unique setting between Sahara desert and Atlantic Ocean. Each day follows a specific protocol to detoxify, regenerate and rebalance your body and mind.

items.question: What thalasso treatments are included in the 7-night program?
items.answer: The program includes 34 varied treatments: Jacquier air bowl, hydromassage baths, Thalgo seaweed wraps, cupping therapy, affusion massages, saunas and hammams, jet showers, hot stone massages, spirulina detox treatments, magnesium baths, ice baths, plus daily yoga and sports coaching. All treatments are provided by our certified team in our exclusive thalasso center.

items.question: Is the 7-night thalasso program suitable for beginners?
items.answer: Perfect for beginners! Our wellness program is progressive and supervised by certified expert therapists. Over 1,200 transformed clients since opening with 92% satisfaction rate. Our hotel ranked #1 on TripAdvisor Dakhla guarantees personalized guidance for your first thalassotherapy experience.

items.question: Why book this thalasso retreat quickly?
items.answer: Each session is limited to maximum 10 participants to ensure an intimate and personalized experience. This exclusivity ensures individual follow-up, privileged access to thalasso facilities (thermal pool, spa, saunas), and maintains the serenity of our unique wellness center between Sahara and Atlantic.

items.question: Where does the 7-night thalasso stay take place?
items.answer: At Dakhla Club Hotel & Spa 4*, the only thalassotherapy center between desert and ocean in Morocco. Ocean-view room accommodation, free access to heated seawater thermal pool, gourmet restaurant, and all spa facilities. Unique geographical location in Dakhla with ideal climate 300 days of sunshine per year, temperatures 18-28¬∞C.

meta.title: Terms of Sale - Dakhla Club
meta.description: Online terms and conditions for Dakhla Club stays

header.title: Online Terms of Sale
header.subtitle: Dakhla Club - Holistic Escape
header.intro: We invite you to read these online terms and conditions of sale for the Dakhla Club website.
header.acceptance: Validation of your online transaction form is considered as irrevocable acceptance of these terms.

preamble.title: 1. Preamble
preamble.content: The following online sales terms govern all transactions established through the Dakhla Club website. Any transaction processed through this website assumes the unconditional and irrevocable acceptance of these conditions by the customer.

purpose.title: 2. Purpose
purpose.content: These terms are intended to define the rights and obligations of the parties in the context of online sales made via the Dakhla Club website.

sales.title: 3. Sales Process
sales.content: The customer connects to the Dakhla Club website and selects the services they wish to book. They then fill in their identity information, accept the terms and click on the "Pay" button. The customer is then redirected to the Centre Mon√©tique Interbancaire secure payment platform where they complete their payment information and validate the payment.

payment.title: 4. Payment Methods
payment.content: To pay on the Internet by credit card, the customer is asked to enter their payment card details on the secure payment page. When the transaction is accepted by the bank, the settlement to debit their account is made on the working day following the date of transaction confirmation. Online payment with credit cards is secured by the Centre Mon√©tique Interbancaire which provides a fully secure payment service.

guarantee.title: 5. Customer Guarantee
guarantee.content: The customer guarantees to Dakhla Club that they have sufficient funds required when using the payment method chosen by them during payment validation.

privacy.title: 6. Data Privacy
privacy.content: The information requested from the customer during online payment is necessary to process the online transaction. It is treated confidentially. The customer has the right to consult or rectify their personal data by sending a request by postal mail to the following address: Dakhla Club, POINT DE DRAGON PK 28, 73000 Dakhla, or by email to the following address: reservation@dakhlaclub.com

proof.title: 7. Proof of Payment
proof.content: Data stored on the Centre Mon√©tique Interbancaire online platform for Dakhla Club's account is considered as proof of payment for the online transaction made by the customer.

services.title: 8. Services Offered
services.content: Dakhla Club offers holistic escape stays including accommodation, meals, wellness activities and excursions. Specific details of each package are described during booking.

cancellation.title: 9. Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellations must be made at least 7 days before the arrival date for a full refund. Cancellations made less than 7 days before arrival are subject to cancellation fees of 50% of the total amount.

liability.title: 10. Liability
liability.content: Dakhla Club strives to provide quality services. However, our liability is limited to the amount paid for the booked services.

law.title: 11. Applicable Law
law.content: These terms of sale are governed by Moroccan law. Any dispute will be submitted to the jurisdiction of the courts of Dakhla, Morocco.

summary.title: Summary
summary.content: These Terms of Use govern access, navigation and use of our establishment's booking site, specifying in particular intellectual property rights, collection and processing of personal data, use of cookies, publisher liability, hyperlinks, as well as the terms for modifying the Terms of Use and applicable law. They are based on law n¬∞ 53-05 relating to the electronic exchange of legal data, law n¬∞ 09-08 on the protection of personal data and law n¬∞ 31-08 relating to consumer protection in distance selling.

section1.title: 1. Purpose and scope
section1.content1: This document defines the Terms of Use (TOU) of the online booking site of Dakhla Club Hotel and DC Thermes, our thalassotherapy center.
section1.content2: Any person accessing the site is required to respect these Terms of Use, which apply to all service offers (accommodation, thalassotherapy, combined packages, etc.) presented online.

section2.title: 2. Access and navigation
section2.content1: The site is accessible 24/7, except for maintenance or force majeure interruptions.
section2.content2: The publisher implements all reasonable means to ensure continuous and secure access, without however guaranteeing the complete absence of error or interruption.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual property
section3.content1: All published content (texts, images, logos, videos, sounds) are protected by intellectual property law and remain the exclusive property of "Dakhla Club Hotel" and "Dakhla Wellness and Health".
section3.content2: Any reproduction, representation or partial or complete distribution without prior written authorization is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. Personal data
section4.content1: Data collected on the site is processed in accordance with law n¬∞ 09-08 relating to the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data.
section4.content2: Data processing is proportionate to the pursued purpose (reservation management, billing, statistics) and is subject to appropriate security measures.

section5.title: 5. Responsibility
section5.content1: The publisher undertakes to describe the proposed services with diligence and accuracy, but cannot guarantee the permanent accuracy of information (prices, availability).
section5.content2: In case of damage related to the use of the site, the publisher's liability is limited to direct and foreseeable damages.
section5.content3: In case of force majeure (natural disasters, regulatory acts, cyberattacks), the publisher's obligations are suspended.

section6.title: 6. Hyperlinks
section6.content: The site may contain links to third-party sites. The publisher exercises no control over them and disclaims any responsibility regarding their content or practices.

section7.title: 7. Modification of Terms of Use
section7.content1: The publisher reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Any modification will be published on the site and the User is invited to consult them regularly.
section7.content2: Continuing to use the site after update constitutes acceptance of the new Terms of Use.

section8.title: 8. Applicable law and jurisdiction
section8.content1: These Terms of Use are governed by Moroccan law, particularly law n¬∞ 53-05 relating to electronic exchange of legal data, law n¬∞ 09-08 relating to personal data protection and law n¬∞ 31-08 on consumer protection for distance sales.
section8.content2: Any dispute relating to the interpretation or execution of the Terms of Use will be subject to the competent courts of the Kingdom of Morocco.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: These Terms of Sale define the terms of distance selling of accommodation services and thalassotherapy treatments offered on the site, in accordance with law n¬∞ 31-08 on consumer protection.

section2.title: 2. Service characteristics
section2.content: Each offer clearly describes the services including accommodation, treatments, packages or combinations, with the main elements: description, duration and terms.

section3.title: 3. Prices and validity
section3.content1: Prices are expressed in Moroccan dirhams including tax, unless otherwise stated.
section3.content2: Each offer includes a clearly indicated validity period.

section4.title: 4. Payment methods
section4.content: Payment is made online by credit card.

section5.title: 5. Confirmation
section5.content: After payment, the client receives an email containing:

section6.title: 6. Right of withdrawal
section6.content: In accordance with law n¬∞ 31-08, the 7-day right of withdrawal does not apply to services performed on a specific date, e.g.: Stay or treatment date.

section7.title: 7. Cancellation, modification, no-show
section7.content1: No refund is provided in case of cancellation or no-show.
section7.content2: Date modifications can be made subject to availability.

section8.title: 8. Responsibility & force majeure
section8.content: The Hotel and thalassotherapy center are responsible for service execution, except in case of force majeure.

section9.title: 9. Durability & conservation
section9.content: The Terms of Sale are permanently accessible on the site.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We attach the utmost importance to protecting your personal data. This policy describes how we collect, use, store and secure your data when you use our website and services (hotel booking, thalassotherapy, etc.).

section1.title: 1. Legal framework
section1.content: This policy complies with law n¬∞ 09-08 relating to the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data, supervised by the National Commission for Data Protection Control (CNDP).

section2.title: 2. Processing purposes
section2.content: The data you entrust to us is processed to:
section2.list2: Respond to your information requests or quotes
section2.list3: Communicate about your stay or booked services
section2.list4: Improve our services and user experience

section3.title: 3. Data collected
section3.content: The following data may be collected:
section3.list3: Reservation details: stay dates, room or treatment type, number of people
section3.list4: Navigation data: IP address, pages viewed, cookies

section4.title: 4. Legal basis
section4.content: In accordance with law 09-08, our processing is based on:
section4.list2: Contract execution or client request for reservation management
section4.list3: Legitimacy of purposes: each data is collected transparently, proportionately and necessarily.

section5.title: 5. Data sharing
section5.content: Your data may be transmitted to:
section5.list2: Our technical service providers (site host, online reservation solution), located in Morocco or abroad, with contractual guarantees compliant with law 09-08 and CNDP obligations.

section6.title: 6. Data security
section6.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against any loss, disclosure, alteration or unauthorized access, particularly via:
section6.list2: Staff awareness and internal access control.

section7.title: 7. Cookies and trackers
section7.list1: Technical cookies necessary for site operation

section8.title: 8. Policy modification
section8.content: We may update this policy at any time. The online version will be modified with the update date clearly indicated. We invite you to consult it regularly.

section1.title: 1. What is a cookie?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when browsing our site. They allow us to collect information about your navigation to improve your user experience.

necessary.title: a. Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.content: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the site. They allow, for example, to remember your preferences or secure your session.

analytics.title: b. Performance and analytics cookies
analytics.content: They collect information about how visitors use the site, such as the most visited pages or error messages. This data helps us improve site functionality.

functional.title: c. Functionality cookies
functional.content: These cookies allow the site to remember choices you make (such as your username, language or region) and provide enhanced and more personalized features.

advertising.title: d. Targeting or advertising cookies
advertising.content: They are used to deliver more relevant advertisements for you and your interests. They also limit the number of times you see an ad and help measure advertising campaign effectiveness.

section3.title: 3. Cookie management
section3.content: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time via your browser settings. Here are links to help pages of major browsers:
